text: Egh nɨ an siriamɨn ingartɨ, an siriam bar izighirɨ an mɨriam avan markɨ. Nɨ kurir siriam ko mɨriamɨn tongɨra toritam ateghtɨ, aruer angazangarim kurimɨn aven mangɨ.6:16 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Egh nɨ ghuriar 3pla kurimɨn aven dar ingarigh, tam vazimɨn, tam arɨghara, egh tam pɨn. Egh tiar akam an mɨriamɨn an ingarigh.
